backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing task management, user registration, and authorization with access control. Provides admin and user functions for managing tasks, profiles, referrals, and earnings with Principal-based authentication.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three admin panel route fixes: resolving black screen issues, verifying admin login with hardcoded credentials (admin/habibur123), and ensuring accessibility without Internet Identity.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, authentication, admin panel, user dashboard, task management, and UI components with blue/white theme styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with neutral grayscale palette (no blue theme colors defined here).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title 'MHS Online Earn Platform' and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes (home, register, login, dashboard, job-task, withdraw, refer-earn, payment-proof, support, admin-panel) with shared layout including Header, FloatingFacebookButton, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/FloatingFacebook: Fixed-position floating button in bottom-right corner that opens Facebook profile link in new tab with blue background styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive navigation header with logo and six menu items (Home, Job Task, Withdraw, Refer & Earn, Payment Proof, Support), featuring hamburger menu for mobile and blue background color.
frontend/src/components/JobCard.tsx: Reusable job card component with independent state management for 10-second countdown timer, displaying idle/running/complete states with start and reset functionality.
Displays referral statistics (count and earnings) and provides a copyable referral link with visual feedback using a card layout.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Renders a list of tasks with completion status, reward badges, and buttons to complete tasks; shows visual indicators for completed vs. pending tasks.
frontend/src/components/TaskManagementPa: Admin panel for adding new tasks via a form and displaying/deleting existing tasks in a table; includes validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Admin table displaying registered users with their details and approval status; provides approve button for pending users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality with configurable AuthClient options and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, task management, referrals, withdrawals, and admin functions with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, and charts using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with local authentication (username: admin, password: habibur123) that displays user management and task management panels in tabs, with login/logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard showing earnings stats, completed tasks, referrals, and daily tasks list; redirects unauthenticated or unapproved users to login/register pages.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section featuring background image, platform statistics (5000+ users, $50k+ paid), and feature cards promoting the earning platform with CTA buttons for register/login.
frontend/src/pages/JobTask.tsx: Displays a grid of 10 daily task cards (JobCard components) that users can complete to earn rewards with 10-second timers.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity authentication; checks user approval status and redirects approved users to dashboard or shows pending approval message.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentProof.tsx: Displays a list of recent payment proofs showing anonymized usernames, withdrawal amounts, dates, and paid status badges to demonstrate platform credibility.
frontend/src/pages/ReferAndEarn.tsx: Displays the referral program page with instructions on how to share referral links and earn rewards. Requires authentication and redirects unauthenticated users to login or registration.
frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx: User registration page that collects username, WhatsApp number, group number, email, password, and optional referral code. Validates inputs, authenticates with Internet Identity, and creates a user profile with a unique referral code.
frontend/src/pages/Support.tsx: Support center page displaying contact information with a Facebook messenger link, response time details, and FAQ section covering withdrawals, referrals, and daily tasks.
frontend/src/pages/Withdraw.tsx: Withdrawal request page with form for entering amount, payment method (bank/PayPal/crypto), and account details. Shows minimum withdrawal of $10 and 1-3 business day processing time.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking the MHS Online Earn Platform with 15 versions, documenting features like user registration, daily tasks, referral system, admin panel, and mobile-responsive design. Contains known issue with /admin-panel route showing black screen in production due to routing misconfiguration.
